import React, { Component } from "react"; export default class about extends Component { render() { return (

About Me

Hello homo-sapiens ,myself Dev Arora and I am a student who is aiming to become a web developer.Trying to learn awesome things everyday and to become better day by day.Believe in the concept of minimiliast and would love to give your ideas into life by coding them and help you in any way possible.

{/*

This is the about section which contains same old boring stuff and if you are reading this that means you are interested in this project or just click by mistake.So here's a fun fact that all pandas in the world are on loan from China,cool isn't it. One more if you were to spell out numbers starting from one, you would not find letter 'A' until thousand.

*/} {/*

Now let me tell u a little bit about this project as I have made this project in REACT.js as frontend as Node.js as backend for the phase-I task given by the SPARKS foundation in their internship programme.You can also check out my other projects also by clicking the link .If you have read this far hope you have an awesome day.Peace.!

*/}
); } }
